security.csp: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; img-src 'self' data: https:; connect-src 'self' https:; font-src 'self' data:

bundle.shortDescription: Anti-Detect Browser Manager with isolated fingerprint profiles
bundle.longDescription: IdentityForge is a powerful anti-detect browser manager that allows you to create and manage multiple browser profiles with unique, spoofed digital fingerprints. Each profile runs in complete isolation with its own cookies, localStorage, and browsing data.
